From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>


* She waited paitently while Prowl absorbed the situation with the pod, 
probably a little effected due to the fact that it was only a blank. A 
proptform with no spark.
But with spark or not, they had to get moving, mainly to find Iris and ask 
about what in the pit was going on herr with this wierd beast mode.

She keeps her snout on the back of Prowls shoulder, knowing that this wasn't 
too good of a time for him. Wounded and now facing a sparkless form. But 
what pain she caused him by the nudge she didn't mean to, only wanting to 
tell him that she knew how he felt and that it was time to get going.
The sun was already setting and it was dangerouse to travel at night, 
especially with the enemy planning to attack as she was sure thery were.
Her eyes look up into his as he looks at her, seeing that there was love 
there which had replaced the blank look he seemed to have only moments 
before.

She could understand why he still loved her, because he loved her for her 
and not her appearence, because he knew that the spark of a bot still beat 
inside her exo-structured chest.
And that was part of the reason she loved him in the first place.
But still, this situation not only effected her but Prowl as well. If she 
hadn't been in pain she could have killed him, and almost did.
And that was why she was going to Iris now, to find out just why and how 
this happened so that she could find out a way to stop it from happening 
next time.

Iron Raptor simply stood still as Prowl nodded to her and walked over to her 
side, still a bit concerned about the stump which was the only thing left of 
half of his wing.
She felt him climb on and settle himself down, moving her back and shoulder 
muscles a bit to settle herself more comfortably to moving with a passenger 
again.
Feeling him lean down she caught the feeling of the kiss and then simply 
listened to what words he whispered into her ear.
They were comforting to a point but only so far, knowing that perhaps he was 
the only one who loved her no matter what shape she took...for if anyone 
knew how she felt she was rather frightened of this beast mode, not being 
able to trust it.
She didn't like its instincts or actions, or how it liked mutilation more 
then anything.
It was horrable!

Iron Raptor sighed as she began to move off towards the setting sun once 
again , continuing on her way towards the Ark.*

" That's one of us which thinks that then..."

* And with that she picked up her speed and soon began to run, heading 
straight for the Ark.*
